content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Always follow all EPAM and Google policies, especially the following:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.   Accounts, Passwords \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never share passwords to any Google account with anyone (temp, vendor or Google employee) not even Tech Stop. Do not use the same password for other accounts including your EPAM account.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use your Google account only for work on Google assignments. Do not log on to the Google corporate network or Google email from any personal device (laptop, tablet, phone) and or use these devices to access or transfer Google information. To work remotely, you must have permission from your EPAM manager. When sending emails, double check that you are sending it to the designated person.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use your EPAM email/account for work related to EPAM and Google for any work related to Google project. You have 2 accounts (EPAM and Google account). Please use both and check emails at least every day. Any conversation related to EPAM should be sent through EPAM email, and any conversation related to Google should be sent through Google email.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•          Do not use the Google account for private mails – use your personal email instead.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•          Do not forward emails to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://non-google.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"non-Google.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"accounts.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•          Do not send attachments to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://non-google.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"non-Google.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"accounts.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"•          Do not use for permission workarounds.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not download illegal or unsafe files or software onto a Google computer/ phone/ tablet;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.   Network and Computer Security \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Remember, everything created at Google belongs to Google.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not log on to or access any Google email, Google resources, or Google network from a personal device. For more information refer to this policy: (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.corp.google.com/security/policy/kittens/personal_machines.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"http://www.corp.google.com/security/policy/kittens/personal_machines.html\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\")\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Source is to be located only on provided desktops. It may not be copied anywhere else, including corporate laptops. For more information refer to this policy:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.corp.google.com/security/policy/kittens/source_laptops.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"http://www.corp.google.com/security/policy/kittens/source_laptops.html\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are provided access to any Production Data, contact your EPAM manager to be sure you are permitted to work with this before taking any action.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Always lock your screens when leaving your workplace.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not install any software on a Google system or device that is not approved by Google.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not use Google-issued computers or other devices for personal purposes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not engage in illegal or prohibited activities on Google systems or devices, for example: downloading torrents. For more information refer to this policy:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.corp.google.com/security/policy/kittens/peer-to-peer.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"http://www.corp.google.com/security/policy/kittens/peer-to-peer.html\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\")\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.   Handling Information \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not ask for, provide or make available any information, especially personally identifiable data, unless it is strictly necessary.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an EPAM or Google personnel asks you for information or data, please think critically about the purpose and the way of providing/sharing any information. Once you are satisfied that the requestor has a genuine business need for the information or document, please provide:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"the minimum (not exceeding the adequate, relevant and limited) information, and\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"anonymous information (where possible). If in doubt, ask your EPAM Manager or EPAM Legal/Data Privacy Management Office.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a third party other then EPAM or Google personnel asks you for information or data, please think even more critically about the purpose and the way of providing/sharing any information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Consider whether you need to password protect or encrypt any documents or use an alternative form of secure data transfer. E.g. do not send any excel charts with personal data without password protection.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Consider to whom you are sending the data. Remove anyone that does not need to receive the data from the email chain. When sending personal/confidential data, remind the recipient to the nature of the data (highly confidential/sensitive data etc.) and it should not be shared/circulated for any other purpose than that requested.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Notify your EPAM Manager immediately upon the following events:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you lose your EPAM devices containing PII or you accidentally send an email containing confidential information or data to the wrong person – we are human and it happens!\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you suspect unauthorized access or an unauthorized attempt to access personal data;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you consider that you or someone else or a group of people have been given excessive access rights to personal data that you/they do not need;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"you are requested:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to transmit, provide a copy of or access to personal data,\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"modify /rectify, erase, stop processing etc. personal data \\nincluded by automated means.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of an investigation takes place, there may be limited time periods for EPAM to respond, therefore it is crucial to report incident, suspect, without any delay.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
